resources.string: Music Library \n Its the Home screen of our App. \n From here you can navigate to four other options.
Recent Activity \n All New songs Added to your Music Library are shown here. \n You can also track your songs journey here.
My Music \n All your music albums are shown here. \n You can shuffle and listen to all songs available on your device.
Radio \n Here you can browse to all different radio stations. \n You can start auto scan or directly connect to any saved radio station.
Settings \n Here you can set your equalizer. \n You can also change your account settings.
